briefTitle: European Organisation of Research and Treatment (EORTC) Quality of Life Questionnaire (QLQ) Breast Cancer Module Update
officialTitle: The Update of the EORTC Quality of Life Questionnaire Breast Cancer Module (EORTC QLQ-Breast 23) Phase 1-3
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients with early or metastatic breast cancer

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients with second malignancy
